text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump FU. I just had someone die from #COVID19 which @realDonaldTrump called a hoax when he knew that it was going to kill thousands upon thousands upon thousands of Americans. Instead of taking action 3 months ago, he went golfing like the fat greasy slob that he is.
